fields.Title of Contribution: Is Anyone Conducting Training Studies with Female Athletes Anymore?
fields.Journal: Journal of Physical Education, Recreation, and Dance (JOPERD)
fields.Description/Abstract: Norms that do exist, such as those published in the "Essentials of Strength and Conditioning," are from small studies, and there is a need for continual updating. *We also need more research about using service-learning projects to give students practical experience working with clients to develop sport-enhancing fitness programs. Since there are very few training studies being conducted with males or females, service-learning provides a great opportunity for students to design, implement, and evaluate strength and conditioning projects. *According to Kraemer (2009), there is a "lack of research that delineates downstream mechanisms" (p. 1 ).
